item.title: Weekly Reading 26 April 2020
item.description: Here are few pointers from last week readings #Career advice for people with bad luck Politics emerge when the players believe the game is zero sum. Try not to learn the wrong habits. Failure I call living Give a full read, worth it #How to overcome mental laziness If you are reading this newsletter at first short and you have less than 5 tabs in your browser you don't need them :) Few gems from the conversation:
